entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gananoque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:26 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grenadier Island 1:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: ENE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
